channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: House of Marley’s new noise-cancelling headphones offer the best battery life I’ve ever seen – and they’re not even expensive
item.description: House of Marley's new headphones have a colossal 130 hours of battery life

item.title: Mint Mobile's epic Black Friday Google Pixel 10 deal gets you $800 off without a trade-in
item.description: Mint's record-breaking deal on the Pixel 10 gets you $800 off without a trade or pricey plan this Black Friday.

item.title: Black Friday sur les montres connectées : voici les offres déjà disponibles chez Apple, Garmin, Xiaomi, Suunto…
item.description: Nous ne sommes que mi-novembre, mais les promotions débarquent avant l’heure. Ce pré-Black Friday met à l’honneur les montres connectées et les bracelets, orientés sport ou lifestyle. Tour d’horizon des meilleures offres déjà proposées par les e-commerçants pour s'offrir une smartwach à prix cassé.

item.title: Le cloud IA de Google promet de ne jamais voir vos données
item.description: Le géant du web veut prouver qu’IA et vie privée peuvent cohabiter. Avec Private AI Compute, Google entend offrir la rapidité du cloud sans compromettre la confidentialité : les données resteraient invisibles, même pour l'entreprise.

item.title: Steam Deck 2, console de salon, manette, casque VR : ce que l’on sait des projets de Valve
item.description: Valve semble avoir dans les cartons de nombreux projets. Le projet Fremont, Steam Frame ou encore Deckard, faisons le point sur les rumeurs et fuites.

item.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie shoots for the stars in first trailer
item.description: The first full Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer has finally landed, and it looks like Nintendo and Illumination are doing it big for their next animated feature. Though there are a few shots of the Mushroom Kingdom and a very miniscule Bowser (Jack Black) imprisoned in a tiny castle, The Super Mario Galaxy Movie‘s new […]

item.title: CMF Headphone Pro could easily cost twice as much – and even if the sound is fun and fierce (rather than fully fledged fantastic) they're still a great buy
item.description: The detailed listening tests, circumaural sound and on-ear extras make for an ideal set of cans for this level – a resounding win for CMF

item.title: Windows 11 boosts security even further by adding native 1Password passkey support
item.description: 1Password Windows 11 integration allows users to sign in to apps and services using Windows Hello.

item.title: Samsung n’hésite pas à casser le prix de ses produits Galaxy et autres durant le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Le pré-Black Friday a débuté il y a plus d’une semaine et les produits Samsung n’ont pas été épargnés. Des références récentes telles que le Galaxy S25 Ultra profite de remises inédites, ce qui permet de s’équiper avec la dernière génération à moindre coût pendant toute cette période promotionnelle.

item.title: UN climate talks are getting weird
item.description: One of the most consequential rounds of global climate negotiations has kicked off in Belém, Brazil. Leaders from nearly every country in the world - but notably, not the US - are gathering to try to ramp up action on climate change during a time of tremendous transformation when it comes to both energy systems […]

item.title: The First ‘Super Mario Galaxy’ Trailer Blasts Off
item.description: Chris Pratt, Jack Black, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Day, and others return for the Nintendo sequel, out April 2026.

item.title: Another Billionaire ‘Crypto Queen’ Will Be Spending More Than a Decade Behind Bars
item.description: The latest queen fled to the United Kingdom to reap the rewards of a multi-billion dollar Ponzi scheme.

item.title: Hackers hijacked antivirus features to install malware - here's what we know
item.description: Gladinet Triofox was abused to deploy remote desktop tools and achieve lateral movement capabilities.

item.title: La période du Black Friday regorge de bons plans, mais voici le TOP 50 des meilleures offres
item.description: Avant le coup d'envoi officiel du vendredi noir à la fin du mois, les offres se multiplient et deviennent de plus en plus intéressantes. D'un côté, il y a le pré-Black Friday chez la majorité des e-commerçants français comme Boulanger, Fnac Darty, Amazon et Cdiscount, et de l'autre côté, il y a aussi le Singles Day, ou 11.11, chez AliExpress et consorts. Vous retrouverez les meilleures offres des deux événements dans cet article. ...

item.title: These Open Earbuds Might Be the Bose Competitor You’ve Been Waiting For
item.description: Soundpeats' Clip1 open wireless earbuds are pulling out all the stops to court audiophiles.

item.title: Gore Verbinski’s New Movie Looks Like the Wildest Thing Ever
item.description: 'Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die' stars Sam Rockwell as a time traveler trying to save the world. It's out February 13.

item.title: This tiny, affordable 1TB flash drive could save you up to $300 on your next MacBook Air – here's how
item.description: The SanDisk Extreme Fit is a new 1TB thumb drive, and it could be a great way to get more storage on a MacBook Air or other laptop.

item.title: Google relaunches Cameyo to entice businesses from Windows to ChromeOS
item.description: After acquiring software virtualization company Cameyo last year, Google has relaunched a version of the service that makes it easier for Windows-based organizations to migrate over to ChromeOS. Now called “Cameyo by Google,” the Virtual App Delivery (VAD) solution allows users to run legacy Windows apps in the Chrome browser or as web apps, preventing […]...

item.title: These new clip open earbuds cost just $50 at launch, and come from one of the best budget earbuds makers – who needs Black Friday?
item.description: Soundpeats' new Clip1 are incredibly affordable anyway for headphones with hi-res specs, and are going in hard at launch

item.title: How Deductive AI saved DoorDash 1,000 engineering hours by automating software debugging
item.description: As software systems grow more complex and AI tools generate code faster than ever, a fundamental problem is getting worse: Engineers are drowning in debugging work, spending up to half their time hunting down the causes of software failures instead of building new products. The challenge has become so acute that it's creating a new category of tooling — AI agents that can diagnose production failures in minutes instead of hours.Deductive AI, a startup emerging from stealth mode Tuesday, believes it has found a solution by applying reinforcement learning — the same technology that powers game-p...

item.title: Vie numérique | Comment l’abandon de CarPlay par les constructeurs pourrait vous coûter cher
item.description: CarPlay et Android Auto. Les consommateurs adorent ces interfaces pour la voiture tirées de leur téléphone intelligent. Mais elles sont sur la voie de sortie. Des milliards en revenus annuels potentiels font saliver les constructeurs, qui aimeraient voir les automobilistes s’abonner à leurs propres services plutôt qu’à ceux d’Apple et de Google.

item.title: Gare aux fichiers ZIP partagés sur des sites web, ils peuvent cacher le virus GootLoader
item.description: GootLoader refait surface. Depuis fin octobre 2025, les cybercriminels exploitent massivement des sites WordPress renfermant le malware pour piéger les internautes. Derrière une simple archive ZIP, GootLoader peut installer, en toute discrétion, des ransomwares et d'autres logiciels malveillants sur votre ordinateur.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign’s first big DLC arrives in December
item.description: Elden Ring Nightreign is keeping things fresh with downloadable content that will add additional playable characters, bosses, and a new area. The Forsaken Hollows DLC costs $15 and launches on December 4th, but players who purchase or own Elden Ring Nightreign’s deluxe or collector’s editions will receive it for free. Elden Ring Nightreign launched in […]...

item.title: Sony’s new PlayStation gaming monitor has a charging stand for the DualSense controller
item.description: Sony announced a new 27-inch monitor for the PlayStation 5 targeting console gamers who prefer playing on a desk. The monitor features a 2,560 x 1,440 resolution, supports HDR with automatic HDR tone mapping during setup, and variable refresh rates of up to 120Hz when connected to the PS5 or PS5 Pro, or up to […]

item.title: A record-breaking government shutdown is almost over, leaving no winners but plenty of frustration
item.description: The longest government shutdown in history could end as soon as Wednesday, on day 43. The longest government shutdown in history could conclude as soon as Wednesday, Day 43, with almost no one happy with the final result.Democrats didn’t get the heath insurance provisions they demanded added to the spending deal. And Republicans, who control the levers of power in Washington, didn’t escape blame, according to polls and some state and local elections that went poorly for them.The fallout of the shutdown landed on millions of Americans, including federal workers who went without paychecks and ai...

item.title: Forerunner 165 : la montre running abordable de Garmin est à un prix encore plus bas pour le Singles Day
item.description: La Forerunner 165 de Garmin est une montre entrée de gamme, qui s'équipe d'un écran Amoled avec un tas de fonctionnalités de sport… Parfaite pour les débutants, la voilà en forte promotion à l'occasion du Singles Day d'AlIExpress : 146,94 euros au lieu de 279 euros de base.

item.title: The first Toy Story 5 teaser threatens the toys with a tablet
item.description: Disney and Pixar have released the first teaser trailer for Toy Story 5, showing tablet screens as an “all-new threat to playtime.” The trailer introduces — much to the horror of Woody and co — a new character called “Lilypad,” a frog-shaped tablet played by Greta Lee (Russian Doll, Tron: Ares), alongside the tagline “the […]

item.title: Fei-Fei Li’s World Labs speeds up the world model race with Marble, its first commercial product
item.description: Marble is different from competitors like Odyssey, Decart, and Google's Genie because creates persistent, downloadable 3D environments rather than generating worlds on-the-fly as you explore.

item.title: The Physics of the Northern Lights
item.description: The aurora borealis is usually seen near the Arctic, but solar winds and magnetic turbulence are sparking some of the best light shows in centuries throughout the US.

item.title: Trump’s plan to give Americans a $2,000 tariff dividend ‘misses the mark’, experts say. Here’s why
item.description: President Trump proposed the idea on his Truth Social Platform, days after the GOP suffered election losses in Virginia and New Jersey. President Donald Trump boasts that his tariffs protect American industries, lure factories to the United States, raise money for the federal government, and give him diplomatic leverage.Now, he’s claiming they can finance a windfall for American families, too: He’s promising a generous tariff dividend.The president proposed the idea on his Truth Social media platform Sunday, five days after his Republican Party lost elections in Virginia, New Jersey, and elsew...

item.title: Les smartphones peuvent maintenant émuler la Nintendo Switch
item.description: L'émulateur Nintendo Switch Citron profite d'une mise à jour lui permettant de tirer le meilleur parti des smartphones Snapdragon 8 Elite.

item.title: Sony lance un moniteur gaming pour la PS5… et le PC
item.description: La prochaine étape pour PlayStation sera-t-elle… un PC gaming ? Après les enceintes sans fil « de bureau », Sony a en effet présenté un moniteur 27 pouces parfaitement adapté à la PS5 (surtout avec son système de recharge pour une manette), mais aussi au PC et au Mac. Hélas, le constructeur n'a pas donné de prix et limite la commercialisation aux États-Unis et au Japon....

item.title: The Coros Pace 3 is better value than almost any Garmin watch you can find – I'd set an alert for the Black Friday deals
item.description: Now that the Coros Pace 4 is out, expect the Pace 3 to drop in price.

item.title: Cdiscount dégaine de belles offres pour le pré-Black Friday : voici les 12 deals à retenir
item.description: Cdiscount a lancé son pré-Black Friday, il y a déjà une semaine, et de nouvelles offres continuent de voir le jour avec des prix particulièrement attractifs. Il y a des réductions sur une large sélection de produits tech, allant des smartphones aux TV en passant par les consoles de jeux. Découvrez les offres les plus intéressantes du moment.

item.title: Galaxy Watch : Samsung passe aussi aux abonnements payants avec de nouveaux entraînements pour ses montres connectées
item.description: Alors que de plus en plus de constructeurs de montres connectées proposent désormais des abonnements payants, Samsung a intégré de nouveaux programmes d'entraînement dans son application Samsung Health, soumis à une souscription.

item.title: Sony's State of Play Japan was filled with indies, remakes, and DLC announcements, but these are the games I'm most excited for
item.description: Sony's State of Play Japan has wrapped. In case you missed it, here are the top five announcements that stood out among a showcase primarily focused on remakes and DLC.

item.title: Who Is Threads For? Meta Would Like One Answer to Be ‘Podcasters’
item.description: Threads is making a concerted effort to woo podcasters.

item.title: Best Home Depot Black Friday Deals for 2025
item.description: Black Friday lasts a month this year at the Home Depot, including half off select tools and tool sets, and deals on Google Nest smart home devices.

item.title: Microsoft-Backed Startup Hits a Milestone in the Race to Power AI
item.description: A demo of the startup’s superconducting cable system promises a more efficient future for energy-hungry data centers.

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Wants to Bring an ‘Alice in Wonderland’ Movie Musical to Life
item.description: Plus, 'VisionQuest' brings Philomena Cunk herself to the MCU.

item.title: Insta360’s new accessories turn its Ace Pro 2 into an instant camera
item.description: Insta360 has announced new accessories for its 8K Ace Pro 2 action camera. The accessories expand the Ace Pro 2’s capabilities as both a video camera with three new lenses and as a still camera with a redesigned grip and a compact wireless printer that can turn shots into instant photos. They’re launching today as […]

item.title: Microsoft-backed VEIR is bringing superconductors to data centers
item.description: The Massachusetts-based startup is taking tech developed for long distance transmissions lines to solve an emerging problem for data center designers.

item.title: Insta360 just unveiled a bizarre cross between a GoPro and an Instax camera – and it could be the strangest camera setup of 2025
item.description: Insta360 has unveiled new accessories for its flagship action camera, the Ace Pro 2, including a photographer's grip, lenses, and an add-on instant printer

item.title: Gen Z’s social media obsession: A psychological analysis with Jonathan Haidt
item.description: Jonathan Haidt, author of ‘The Anxious Generation,’ breaks down the psychology behind Gen Z’s social media addiction and what digital dependance actually does to a young person’s brain. Jonathan Haidt, author of ‘The Anxious Generation,’ breaks down the psychology behind Gen Z’s social media addiction and what digital dependance actually does to a young person’s brain....

item.title: The wizard of crops: Microsoft’s ‘Oz’ aims to transform farming
item.description: The AI assistant helps farmers navigate everything from weather and pests to fertilizer and yield optimization. It shouldn’t be much of a surprise that an AI-powered tool called “Oz” is heading out of, or near, the Emerald City.

item.title: Paige Bueckers is winning the partnerships game. Her new Fanatics deal shows how
item.description: The WNBA Rookie of the Year on her new partnership, how she selects brand partners, and how she’s using her platform for good. Growing up, WNBA star Paige Bueckers says she was “huge” on sports memorabilia. She collected items across a range of sports from her favorite players, including their posters, autographs, and jerseys. Today, she’s having a full circle moment: Bueckers just announced an exclusive, multi-year deal with Fanatics, which will make the sports apparel juggernaut the sole provider of her memorabilia and collectibles....

item.title: Your AI assistant might be making you worse at your job, unless it’s built right
item.description: Learning how to best use these tools is crucial, too. A few years ago, when I was working at a traditional law firm, the partners gathered with us with barely any excitement. “Rejoice,” they announced, unveiling our new AI assistant that would make legal work faster, easier, and better. An expert was brought in to train us on dashboards and automation. Within months, her enthusiasm had curdled into frustration as lawyers either ignored the expensive tool or, worse, followed its recommendations blindly....

item.title: Boîte de réception | Mettre fin au pourriel, récupérer sa musique et éradiquer un logiciel intempestif
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on essaie de mettre fin au pourriel, on déjoue les limites de la musique en streaming et on désinstalle un logiciel intempestif.

item.title: Job cuts again? Welcome to the grim new era of ‘forever layoffs’
item.description: Rolling layoffs are becoming more common, but they ‘create cultures of anxiety, insecurity, and resentment,’ according to a new Glassdoor report. Glassdoor Economic Research has released its Worklife Trends report for 2026. A key theme highlighted throughout is the growing disconnect between workers and their leaders.

item.title: Is MTG the brand pivot of the year? Why Marjorie Taylor Greene is suddenly making sense to her haters
item.description: The Republican firebrand has appeared more measured and more critical of party leadership in recent appearances. Is it a campaign in the making? Something is going on with Marjorie Taylor Greene that’s making Americans furrow their brows and say, “What in the MAGA universe is going on?” The thing is, the Republican representative from Georgia, known as “MTG,” is a suddenly making more sense—even to her detractors. ...

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs sans fil, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Apple AirPods, JBL Charge, Marshall, Nothing, Bowers & Wilkins... Les grandes marques de l'audio bradent leurs écouteurs, casques, enceintes, barres de son et autres pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday. Voici notre sélection des meilleures offres !
